pr_title: Fix local maven build of presto-testng-services

timeline.message:
Fix local maven build of presto-testng-services

Previously retrying could be only enabled via CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION.
This commit restores ability to enable retrying via system properties.

timeline.bodyText: Preexisting, but this is wrong. when the sys propeerty is "false", we should not be enabled
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: What if sys property is false but CONTINUOUS_INTEGRATION is set? To me this is OR so it is correct as any of this enables the retrying.
replies.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: sys property is "closer to invocation" and thus should override env variable presence
replies.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Oh... now I get your point. You mean that one should override the other, that makes sense. See: #6045
replies.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: printing but to 'null' suggests the value is "null", not null
timeline.author: findepi
